summary: This bill, the "It's About Time Act," proposes to change the Federal fiscal year. It aims to shift the fiscal year from the current October 1 - September 30 schedule to a January 1 - December 31 calendar. The bill mandates the President prepares a transition budget and proposed legislation for the period of October 1, 2026, to December 31, 2026. Agencies and departments must also transition.  Effective date for the change is January 1, 2027.
